name: PC Engine Fan: Special CD-ROM Vol. 2
overview: PCE Fan Special CD-Rom Vol. 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by NEC and published by Tokuma Shoten, which was released in Japan in 1996. PC Engine Fan: Special CD-ROM Vol. 2 contained demos of Kokuu Hyouryuu Nirgends and Blue Breaker, as well as a Game Database.
